verses.text: ‘E Sihova, ko hoku loto ‘oku ‘ikai ke taka ‘olunga, Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ke mahiki hoku mata; Pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u hanga ‘o kau ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku lalahi, Pea fakaofo ange ‘i ha‘aku mafai.
Ka Kuo u fakanonga mo fakana‘a hoku laumālie; Hangē ha tamasi‘i mavae ‘i he fatafata ‘o ‘ene fa‘ē; ‘Io, hangē ko e tamasi‘i mavae ko ē, ‘Oku pehē ‘a e toka ‘iate au hoku laumālie.
‘E ‘Isileli, ke tu‘u ho‘o ‘amanaki ‘ia Sihova Mei he taimi ni pea ta‘engata.
